svg.style: background: transparent; background-color: transparent; color-scheme: light dark;

width="50" height="44" as="alternateBounds" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="1w8mVGZZx0lr2OG9-v-e-9" value="" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;" edge="1" parent="1w8mVGZZx0lr2OG9-v-e-5" source="1w8mVGZZx0lr2OG9-v-e-6" target="1w8mVGZZx0lr2OG9-v-e-8"> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="1w8mVGZZx0lr2OG9-v-e-10" value="提示注入攻击检测" style="whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" vertex="1" parent="1w8mVGZZx0lr2OG9-v-e-5"> <mxGeometry x="381" y="29.56360655737705" y="83" /> </Array> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="1w8mVGZZx0lr2OG9-v-e-13" value="有害内容输出检测" style="whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" vertex="1" parent="1w8mVGZZx0lr2OG9-v-e-5"> <mxGeometry x="381" </mxGeometry> </mxCell> </root> </mxGraphModel> </diagram> </mxfile>

rect.style: fill: light-dark(#ffffff, var(--ge-dark-color, #121212)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));

path.style: fill: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));

rect.style: fill: light-dark(#ffffff, var(--ge-dark-color, #121212)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 121px; height: 1px; padding-top: 83px; margin-left: 27px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #000000;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

path.style: fill: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));
fill: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));

rect.style: fill: light-dark(#ffffff, var(--ge-dark-color, #121212)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));
